Html:
I'm new to rawr and trying to get used to, I think I've started to get the concept of it but there's just a small problem I get. Everytime I open it, the screen only shows 1 trinket instead of both and when I try to maximize, increase the size of the window's borders or anything involving the window it doesn't solve the problem. So I was wondering how I can get it to show it the 2 trinkets (guessing it involves making it a smaller scale). Also can't see the bracers**.

 

P.S I'm using Vista if that accounts for anything.
Your system either has a really low Screen resolution set or your DPI settings are really high, or both.
how do I change either setting (if it's possible)? I'm using a hp pavilion entertainment PC (laptop) with a 13" or so monitor.
Display Properties, Advanced, DPI, set it to Normal.
